titleStmt.title: The sacred doctrine of diuinitie gathered out of the worde of God. Togither with an explication of the Lordes prayer.
titleStmt.author: Finch, Henry, Sir, d. 1625.
Fenner, Dudley, 1558?-1587.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes erroneously attributed to Dudley Fenner, whom the preface, dated 1 Jan. 1589, mentions as having died three years previously.
Publication place and printer's name from STC.
Identified as STC 10774 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
